subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Roy Hibbert, ridiculed after going scoreless in Game 1, had a season-high 28 points with nine rebounds as the Pacers defeated the Wizards, 86-82, to even their series at 1-1.
snippet: Roy Hibbert, ridiculed after going scoreless in Game 1, had a season-high 28 points with nine rebounds as the Pacers defeated the Wizards, 86-82, to even their series at 1-1.
